1. Installing Octave on Ubuntu

sudo apt-get install octave  
sudo apt-get install octave-headers

2. Adding netcdf support

downloaded octcdf from
<http://ocgmod1.marine.usf.edu/mediawiki/index.php/NetCDF_toolbox_for_Octave>

followed instructions on the site to install - which worked fine.

3. Installed gnu plot

sudo apt-get install gnuplot-x11
